languages.text: "Возможно, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Ангел Императора{/g} сможет рассказать вам о чем-то, что ему стало известно за время заточения в этих стенах. Узнайте, что у него на уме... только постарайтесь не злить — нрав у Ульфара поистине крутой!"

traits.locale_text: "Возможно, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Ангел Императора{/g} сможет рассказать вам о чем-то, что ему стало известно за время заточения в этих стенах. Узнайте, что у него на уме... только постарайтесь не злить — нрав у Ульфара поистине крутой!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"
languages.original_text: "Возможно, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Ангел Императора{/g} сможет рассказать вам о чем-то, что ему стало известно за время заточения в этих стенах. Узнайте, что у него на уме... только постарайтесь не злить — нрав у Ульфара поистине крутой!"

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} some of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} some of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} some of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “或许{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}帝皇的天使{/g}会告诉我们他在囚禁的这段时间里了解到了哪些事情。试着了解他心中的想法……但尽量不要惹怒他，乌尔法的脾气真的相当暴躁！”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"

traits.locale_text: “或许{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}帝皇的天使{/g}会告诉我们他在囚禁的这段时间里了解到了哪些事情。试着了解他心中的想法……但尽量不要惹怒他，乌尔法的脾气真的相当暴躁！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Emperor's Angel might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"

languages.text: «Tal vez el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}ángel del Emperador{/g} pueda compartir algo de lo que ha aprendido durante su cautiverio entre estos muros. Descubra lo que está pensando, pero intente no enfurecerlo... ¡la ira de Ulfar es verdaderamente terrible!».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}ángel del Emperador{/g} pueda compartir algo de lo que ha aprendido durante su cautiverio entre estos muros. Descubra lo que está pensando, pero intente no enfurecerlo... ¡la ira de Ulfar es verdaderamente terrible!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}皇帝の天使{/g}が、この壁の内にとらわれている間に知り得たことを何か話してくれるやもしれません。彼の心の内を知るべきでしょうが…怒らせてはなりません。ウルファーは、実に気性の荒い人物です」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}皇帝の天使{/g}が、この壁の内にとらわれている間に知り得たことを何か話してくれるやもしれません。彼の心の内を知るべきでしょうが…怒らせてはなりません。ウルファーは、実に気性の荒い人物です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht kann der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Engel des Imperators{/g} uns berichten, was er während seiner Gefangenschaft in diesen Wänden erfahren hat. Entdeckt, was in seinem Verstand ruht ... doch hütet Euch davor, ihn zu erzürnen. Ulfars Temperament ist wahrlich zum Fürchten!"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht kann der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Engel des Imperators{/g} uns berichten, was er während seiner Gefangenschaft in diesen Wänden erfahren hat. Entdeckt, was in seinem Verstand ruht ... doch hütet Euch davor, ihn zu erzürnen. Ulfars Temperament ist wahrlich zum Fürchten!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}ange de l'Empereur{/g} acceptera peut-être de nous révéler ce qu'il a appris lors de sa captivité entre ces murs. Découvrez ce qu'il sait... mais veillez à ne pas provoquer sa colère. Ulfar est du genre féroce lorsqu'il s'emporte ! »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"

traits.locale_text: « L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}ange de l'Empereur{/g} acceptera peut-être de nous révéler ce qu'il a appris lors de sa captivité entre ces murs. Découvrez ce qu'il sait... mais veillez à ne pas provoquer sa colère. Ulfar est du genre féroce lorsqu'il s'emporte ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Belki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}İmparator'un Meleği{/g}, bu duvarlarda mahpus hâlde geçirdiği günlerden öğrendiklerini bizimle paylaşmak ister. Ne biliyorsa öğrenmeli... Ancak temkinli yaklaşmalıyız, Ulfar'ın öfkesi şakaya gelmez!"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Emperor's Angel{/g} might share something of what he has learned during his captivity within these walls. Discover what is on his mind... but try not to anger him — Ulfar's temper is ferocious indeed!"

traits.locale_text: "Belki {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}İmparator'un Meleği{/g}, bu duvarlarda mahpus hâlde geçirdiği günlerden öğrendiklerini bizimle paylaşmak isteyecektir. Ne biliyorsa öğrenmeli... Ancak temkinli yaklaşmalıyız, Ulfar'ın öfkesi şakaya gelmez!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
